name: cl-judge
description: online judge version 2.0 frontend and backend

scripts.test: cd server && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd server && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.dep:install:frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dep:install:server: cd server && rm -rf node_modules && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dep:install: npm run dep:install:root && npm run dep:install:frontend && npm run dep:install:server

author: Cyberlabs
